definition: Bo Xilai (1949-), PRC politician, appointed to the Politburo in 2007, sentenced in 2013 to life imprisonment for corruption and misconduct
meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Nikai was already scheduled to meet Chinese Commerce Minister Bo Xilai during his visit, which ends Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 二階俊博計劃與中國商務部部長薄熙來會面。

sentences.english: Mr.Bo appeared, singing twice and introducing Red Army veterans.
sentences.chinese: 薄熙來出場唱歌兩次並介紹了紅軍老戰士。

sentences.english: Gingkos are the backbone of a greenery campaign initiated by Mr. Bo, the party secretary.
sentences.chinese: 移植銀杏樹是市委書記薄熙來推行綠色運動的重點。

sentences.english: During his visit, Minister Bo Xilai will hold talks with him.
sentences.chinese: 訪問期間，薄熙來部長將與他進行會談。
